website_summaries.verdict: Lower dose melatonin option for the nights you need an extra push into dreamland.
pros: Manufactured by one of the most trusted supplement brands
Bonus points for including calcium, too
Fast release – should work within an hour
No preservatives or artificial colors or flavors
cons: Some reports that while it helps people fall asleep, it doesn't help when it comes to staying asleep

customer_reviews.title: com which rated this one as the best melatonin in terms of quality
customer_reviews.text: I used to use this melatonin and switched to other brands (whatever was cheapest at CVS) over the last few years. Then I came across labdoor.com which rated this one as the best melatonin in terms of quality, purity, and effectiveness so I switched back and I think I have been falling asleep easier/faster. I feel better knowing an independent lab tested this brand and found it to be pure.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Help For My Naked Dog!!
customer_reviews.text: Our little dog, a purebred Toy Poodle, has Alopecia X. After some research, I read about melatonin therapy. I needed 3 mg tablets (1/2 tab 2 x a day) and knew I needed to brand that didn't have fillers in it. This has been wonderful. She's been on melatonin for 10 weeks. New fur is coming in. She is no longer naked and her new fur is soft and luxurious! She will be taking it for another 3 months
customer_reviews.author: Skylover

customer_reviews.title: Not all brands are the same. NatureMade is way better.
customer_reviews.text: I got a deal on another brand of melatonin a few months ago and figured they were all the same. I noticed that I was having more trouble sleeping on the other stuff but didn’t think much of it. I normally bite the 3mg NatureMades in half and tried that with the other brand but resorted to using full pills and still being restless. I recently switched back to NatureMade and HOLY COW is this stuff better! I’m back to half a pill (1.5mg) each night and I fall asleep quickly and sleep like a rock! Never switching again.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I tried this brand because my favorite Melatonin manufacturer, Schiiff, has apparently gone out of business or has stopped making the product. It was absolutely the best melatonin on the market. This "Nature's Made" product is worthless. If I did not buy the instant product, and did not see the label on the bottle, I would swear it is a fake placebo. Has none of the melatonin effects expected of this product. If Schiff ever comes back on the market, I will buy a case. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Terrapin Station

customer_reviews.title: This brand of melatonin doesn’t quite work
customer_reviews.text: I initially posted five stars because everything arrived fine and I figured these melatonin pills would be just like any other ones I buy. Ive been trying them in different dosages, up to 9 mg and can’t sleep. I have insomnia and usually melatonin helps me get a couple hours but not with this brand. It’s not just me, cause I gave my mom two of them and she doesn’t have insomnia, but she didn’t feel any difference than a normal night. Not even my younger siblings felt anything at all. I assume that the tablet itself isn’t well absorbed into our bodies or the pill isn’t the strength advertised cause I’ve never had this issue with melatonin.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION:  Read ingredients.  High calcium is dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: CAUTION: Excessive calcium. No cautionary mention. Doctor recommended 15mg after surgery. I’m now in trouble because of very high calcium level. I don’t think many realize that calcium is used in pills as a binding agent. There should be a warning. I take no supplements because of safety concerns but reseached this product and NatureMade was highly reguarded. I don’t doubt that it’s a good company but this issue should have been considered. BE CAREFUL. I almost killed myself and now have kidney damage and extreme muscle pain. Supplements may be natural but are still chemicals and tablets have other ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Black

customer_reviews.title: Something wrong with this stuff
customer_reviews.text: It gave me the opposite effect of what it's intended for. Instead of a restful nights sleep it kept me awake and when I finally fell asleep, it caused me to drift in and out of light sleep all night. It felt like I woke up and fell back asleep 100 times throughout the night. I thought the first time it could have been a fluke so I tried it again and same thing. I've been taking melatonin a few times a month for over 10 years and I've never had this type of reaction. Very strange, would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a horrible nightmares!
customer_reviews.text: So they discontinued Schiff melatonin out of the blue which I had used for years. The first brand I ordered made me groggy the next day so I ordered this one . The very first night I took it I got to sleep OK but I had horrible nightmares the entire night. I have now ordered a third brand and we’ll see how that goes . So frustrating when something works so well and then the company discontinues it
customer_reviews.author: J. Hander

customer_reviews.title: this is amazing. wish i heard about it before
customer_reviews.text: this is amazing. wish i heard about it before. recommended by my pharmacist. works like a charm!!! ordered it on amazon cus it was cheaper. makes me sleep like a baby (i have insomnia). take it and go straight to bed without touching any electronics, you'll fall asleep in like 15 min.
customer_reviews.author: Anika Tabassum

customer_reviews.title: Helps Me Fall Asleep
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had trouble sleeping all my life. I would stay awake for hours even when I was really tired. I used to hate that feeling of wanting to sleep but can’t quite get there. Ever since I’ve been taking these pills, I fall asleep and stay asleep all night. These have changed my life and sleep schedule dramatically. Honestly don’t know what would happen if I stopped taking these... but I guess I don’t really have to find out.
customer_reviews.author: Tanusree Munshi

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer: The sleep aid I needed so badly
customer_reviews.text: These things are life savers. I just moved to a busy street and I was getting so little sleep that I felt like a full-time zombie. It took me a few months of this to realize I needed help so I finally purchased the 3 mg size. They work amazing! They knock me out in 20-30 minutes, and I'm finally sleeping through the night. Even better, after using these for a few weeks, I've noticed that I need them less. I still take one every so often when I feel restless, but they work every time! I don't feel any grogginess in the mornings either, so that's great. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: They work great and I prefer this dosage.
customer_reviews.text: I have had issues with insomnia for as long as I can remember. I hate taking prescription pills every single day (Lunesta) so I take melatonin most days of the week and my prescription medication if I am still not able to fall asleep. I know that there are much larger dose pills out on the market but I usually am fine with a single 3 mg pill each night. They absolutely do help reset your body clock so that you can get tired enough to fall asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Myron TTop Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for dogs too!
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs has experienced infrequent, short seizures while sleeping. My vet suggested that I try melatonin before putting my dog on real medication. I give one 3mg pill near bedtime and the dog sleeps longer, and without seizures during rest. I have bought this brand and another one and they both seem effective, but Nature Made's tablet size is slightly larger. Still, either pill can be administered stuffed into a piece of cheese or even just a smidge of peanut butter. IMPORTANT NOTE: I originally purchased a different brand, which had xylitol as an ingredient---toxic for dogs! Read ingredients carefully and consult your own vet for additional advice.
customer_reviews.author: LegoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Helped with my insomnia
customer_reviews.text: I have been using melatonin to treat my insomnia for about a month now as recommended by my doctor. So far it has been working wonderfully! Its important to note that you should take it 1-2 hours before you want to expect to fall asleep and to not take too much because you will build a tolerance. I've always trusted this particular brand of supplements and have never been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a sleeping pills,right??
customer_reviews.text: Writing review after suing for 3 days. So I took one pill as it said on a bottle hour before sleep.. and slept like hour or two. Afterwards wake up and can’t stop my brain from thinking hard... second day-I tried one again.. same effect,no sleep besides couple hours. third day- i double the dose (2 pills), slept AGAIN couple hours..woke up.. brain still running. I took another one so it’s already 3 pills in one night(!) slept like couple more hours and can’t sleep no more.. I don’t get it,it supposed to help you sleep all night or just small amount of time??? Sadly,doesn’t work on me. Zzz quill do kinda better job if compare..
customer_reviews.author: Irina S.

customer_reviews.title: Used for a dog, actually.
customer_reviews.text: My veterinarian recommended this for my dog. Her coat had gotten very thin. She's a Boston Terrier and I started seeing her skin under her hair. It hadn't always been that way, she wasn't itchy, and it wasn't hot weather. I started giving her one every evening and lo and behold she grew a beautiful, shiny hair coat in about 8 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Frenchiesu

customer_reviews.title: Strawberry Fields Forever.
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost nightly to sleep. I don't wake up groggy so I'm guessing it's a good dose. Melatonin can give some people really, really trippy dreams. I'm surprised it isn't illegal. It sells for more than twice the price at our local supermarket!
customer_reviews.author: DJ Buddy - Bud Fleisher

customer_reviews.title: Regulates circadian rhythm and placebo works
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to help regulate my sleep. Melatonin is like a vitamin supplement. Taking a melatonin supplement does not improve sleep quality beyond the extent of your sleep hygiene. It merely seeks to regulate and correct the circadian rhythm by signaling the body that it's time to sleep. Very useful for jet lag or to correct sleep cycle abnormalities. Personally, it functions as a sleep regulator as well as a placebo effect for falling asleep. I tend to be a night owl, so it helps me when I need to wake up early the next day but have trouble falling asleep.
customer_reviews.author: On Go

customer_reviews.title: Cushing's Dog Hair Loss Re-growth, Better Sleep
customer_reviews.text: Use this in conjunction with Lignans and Mitotane for my 20 lbs. dog's Cushing's disease. It hasn't made much of a difference yet in his Cushing's symptoms, but it has helped a lot with his "sundowner's symdrome" and restlessness and with his hair loss on his back--it looks much better now! I think it is helping him sleep better and as a result, he is less confused during the day and doesn't pace around as much as he used to. Fingers crossed it helps with his Cushing's as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I am someone who stays awake thinking for hours even if I am very tired. I take one of these about 30 minutes before I head to bed and I knock out all night. I sleep so hard I don’t even remember dreaming or hearing anything while asleep. Finally I can go to sleep when I want to!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Musquez

customer_reviews.title: This really knocks you out within 30 minutes to an hour of taking it
customer_reviews.text: For me personally, its effectiveness wears off after several days of use, so this will only be temporary solution for whenever i want to get my sleep schedule back on track. One of the side effects is irritability. I did feel like i was experiencing that, but only after taking it for more than a week. After I stopped taking it, the irritability went away. Again personally for me this will be only a temporary solution. I believe everyone reacts to melatonin in different ways, so I think its best to try and see for yourself what its like.
customer_reviews.author: VingTsunProtege

customer_reviews.title: Makes me horribly tired when I wake up
customer_reviews.text: These make me sleepy within 30-40 mins of taking it. But it doesn’t make me stay asleep consistently. When I wake up in the morning it takes me a few hours to not be tired anymore so that’s not good.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney W.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Thank You For a Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: The older I become, the less I sleep (through the night). I'm thrilled that a friend recommended "Melatonin." Since I started using this product, I'm sleeping so well! I haven't felt this refreshed, in years. I, highly, recommend "Nature Made" melatonin.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia M

customer_reviews.title: Apparently humans don't actually need this much melatonin, even ...
customer_reviews.text: Apparently humans don't actually need this much melatonin, even to go to sleep, so I cut each pill in half. I don't need this to go to sleep, but I use them when I need to fall asleep at by a certain time. I can absolutely feel the difference in how well rested I am. I thought this would affect the vividness of my dreams, but I'm not sure I have that effect.
customer_reviews.author: Terah

customer_reviews.title: Good for falling asleep asap, not so much for quality sleep
customer_reviews.text: It does put me to sleep, but whenever I take it I notice that I am more likely to have really weird dreams compared to when I don't take it. I also tend to wake up more often, but I almost immediately fall asleep. I would use this product if I absolutely needed to sleep "like if I had a test or something tomorrow" and did not have the time to lay down in bed for 1-2 hours to fall asleep. However, if you don't need to fall asleep asap I do recommend falling asleep naturally as opposed to being reliant on these. Please note these were my personal experience to this product, every person may experience something entirely different.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Taking just before bed works great for me
customer_reviews.text: This particular product works well for me. I have no problem falling asleep, but rather have a problem waking up 3-4 hours later and not being able to go back to sleep. I read a previous review that said to cut this 3 mg pill into 2 or 3 pieces, as you don't need much. So I've been doing that. I'll take a 1/2 or 1/3 as I'm ready to fall asleep, and if I wake up later, I'll take another 1/3. I leave it under my tongue for faster absorption. If I wake up close to the time I need to get up, I don't take that 1/3 because it makes me feel groggy for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Yoga Fan

customer_reviews.title: A nice sleep aide
customer_reviews.text: My work schedule puts me in a position to use a sleep aide more times than not. I saw a cable commercial for a sleep aide but it was way too expensive. I checked out the ingredients and Melatonin was their main active ingredient. I have used and I am using Nature Made supplements, thus this product was a no brainier. This product works but it took 2-3 times to get a good feel for the length of sleep to get and wake up just fine. Do not worry, this product works but you need to get a feel for it. I recommend this product and this company over the others.
customer_reviews.author: Terence GF Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help me sleep
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just me, but this didn't help me sleep at all. It just gave me a mild headache the day after. I don't know if that's the fault of the brand, though, or whether melatonin just doesn't affect me (since this is the only brand I've tried).
customer_reviews.author: Marina C.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I read this was one of the best melatonin supplements but it did not work for me. Luckily Amazon accepts returns. After taking this product I would stay awake and feel nervous. I like to use Natrol gummies. They put me out within minutes and I sleep all night.
customer_reviews.author: bvdew

customer_reviews.title: for use to help fall asleep
customer_reviews.text: not for staying asleep. I take Magnesium supplements to help stay asleep and have more restful sleep. These will make you drowsy and should be taken a little before bed to help you not just stare at your phone.
customer_reviews.author: elliott wellman

customer_reviews.title: Works Great. Good Brand.
customer_reviews.text: I like that this melatonin brand is USP verified, and pharmacist recommended. The size of the bottle was larger than expected. This amount of melatonin in this brand works as a sleep aid IF I take it an hour or more before bedtime. I have used other brands that work faster, but I trust this brand more than the others, and that is why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: KatieScarlettTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: My brain stays functioning all the time even when trying to rest. This product is said to have no effect with getting you to sleep but to help you better rest once getting to sleep. I have to say personally, this has assisted with getting me to sleep and having better quality of sleep throughout the night. It’s be so helpful and I’m on my second bottle of it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I usually take one an hour before I want to sleep and I noticeably feel sleepy 30-45 minutes after I take it. I have problems staying up late (past 1-3am) and I really want to regulate my sleep better (12-1am). I have no frame of reference for how it works relative to other brands but I've read that this one is one of the most effective products of it's kind (on Labdoor) and it'll probably last me a year so it's an easy decision for me to pick this up over other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: HELPS YOU SLEEP!!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby always has trouble falling asleep and STAYING asleep. Being a believer in holistic, natural supplements, I suggested he try Melatonin as a sleep aid. He was dubious, but tried them anyway. WHAT RESULTS! He takes a 3 mg. capsule about an hour prior to bedtime, and then falls asleep easily and sleeps all night. HOWEVER, he said he has rather strange dreams when he takes Melatonin?? So he now only takes it about every other night. I suggest experimenting with the 1, 3, or 5 mg. capsules. Some people need more, some less.
customer_reviews.author: CommerceReigns

customer_reviews.title: Great Sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I use to take 5mg of melatonin, but after doing research, I learned that lower is better. These pills do wonder for me and quickly get me to sleep within 30 minutes of taking it. They are easy to swallow and have no flavor at all. I do sometimes wake up throughout the night, but I quickly fall back asleep. They are not 100% perfect, but that's is MY experience with them.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: WORKS FOR THIS HUMAN AND HER CANINE
customer_reviews.text: After years of much improved sleep using Melatonin, we tried this with our elderly dog who had become restless, confused, and plain howling grouchy at night. It has been a week now and I am THRILLED to report she is sleeping through the night (on 1/2 tab - 1.5 mg - for 15 lb weight). It is nice to see her enjoying her day time hours again, since being able to get a good night's rest. I am happy to find something supplemental, not a heavy duty prescription drug.
customer_reviews.author: HAPPYMAMA

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several less expensive versions of melatonin and it’s hit or miss if they’re going to work or not. This one is verified by USP. Most supplements or not verified by any outside agencies, but apparently NatureMade is. When I got this I used two of the 3 mg pills and slept really well that night! These are what they say they are. I’m glad I found them!
customer_reviews.author: Captain Jack

customer_reviews.title: Reputable brand read for dosage recommendation
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this brand. I’ve been taking melatonin for years and this beats anything you will find at the store. Most melatonin is stronger than the dose on the bottle because it is not well regulated. If you feel drowsy with the current melatonin you are taking this may likely be why. The 3 mg is all I need to stay asleep. I recommend starting at 5mg and using a pill cutter until you reach the smallest dose that will allow you to fall asleep and stay asleep to minimize drowsiness.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Great melatonin, works well!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome melatonin! I tried another brand of melatonin years ago and it didn't work for me. After weeks of suffering from insomnia and taking zzquil, benadryl,and even a rx sleep aid, I decided to try this melatonin. It makes me sleepier faster than the rx sleeping pill (though it doesn't always keep me in a deep sleep all night). But in general, my speed of falling asleep and time spent awake during the night has been greatly reduced when taking this. I love that it kicks in fast too, I take it 15 minutes before I want to fall asleep.
customer_reviews.author: AC14

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work...
customer_reviews.text: I have used other brands and they all worked like a charm so I was very disappointed that this brand didn't work at all. I tried it on a few different night and it didn't work at all. Very disappointed... Thanks to Amazon i received full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Steve O

customer_reviews.title: Great night sleep
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! I have worked night shift for several years and recently switched to days. I struggled with my sleep cycle and tried everything! My daughter kept raving about melatonin so I gave it a try. 30 minutes after taking them I can barely keep my eyes open. I wake up feeling like I’ve gotten a great nights sleep. Never feel groggy the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Every time I have taken this I do not fall into a deep sleep. I lay somewhere in between dreaming and being awake. The entire night. The next morning I feel exhausted. Ive taken another brand in the past that has worked. Ill definitely be switching back.
customer_reviews.author: lesley

customer_reviews.title: not workig
customer_reviews.text: After taking these pills, I can't sleep at all. I tried to take them a few times and each time I fell asleep only in the morning. I can say that without them I fall asleep somehow, but after taking them I cannot sleep. The worst sleeping pills I've ever taken.
customer_reviews.author: Brygida

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I’m very sensitive to anything that gives you energy, or makes you sleepy. As a nurse who works overnight, I needed something to help put me to sleep during the day. Everytime I take this I wake up feeling hungover and my eyes hurt. It does work, but I’d rather just chug NyQuil at this point
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No effect :(
customer_reviews.text: Honestly wish they did something for me but I've noticed no change in my inability to fall asleep. I've tried taking up to 3 two hours in advance but still nothing. Oh well...
customer_reviews.author: Pooja S

customer_reviews.title: ... more natural than prescription medication to help her sleep better. I ordered this for her and she says ...
customer_reviews.text: My mom said she's been having trouble sleeping and wanted something more natural than prescription medication to help her sleep better. I ordered this for her and she says it's been helping her fall asleep and stay sleeping through the night.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, most of the time!
customer_reviews.text: I don't take Melatonin every night. I find that it doesn't work well every time I take it! Not sure if it the product or just me! When it works it works well. There are times though that I find myself just laying there wide awake! Still better than having to take prescription drugs, in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A. Smarjesse

customer_reviews.title: Melatonin 3 mg Tablets, 240 Count — Broken Seal
customer_reviews.text: I won't bother whipping up a pro's and con's list because I'm not willing to consume anything from an unsealed bottle. Yes, unsealed. Upon opening this package, I discovered that Nature Made's usual seal was non-existent, as the paper and aluminum "seal" fell right off as soon as I untwisted the plastic top. I would say to purchase this product in store, if possible, or another seller/website. As a person with a particularly poor immune system, I'll just have to find another website or go without because the minimum amount of quality control could not be met. DO NOT BUY this from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I've always had problems falling asleep. Too much going on and the brain won't stop talking! approx. 9mg and usually asleep in under 30 minutes. My ONLY complaint is why they put 120 tabs in a bottle that would easily hold 5 times that amount.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be ffective. The price is good too!
customer_reviews.text: Have revised my previous review, where I said I tried it and it didn't work. Here is the revised revoew: Didn't quite work on me the first night (too much anxiety during a hot and uncomfortable night), but tried it again in similar conditions and worked fine the second night. I slept much better and without waking up several times.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: I have taken melatonin in the past to help me ...
customer_reviews.text: I have taken melatonin in the past to help me with sleep issues. I have taken this for about a week now, I feel it a higher dosage than it claims. When I take this before bed, I get extremely tired really fast. It knocks me out for the entire night. Even the following day, I am just extremely tired. I am going to need to switch to a even lower dosage or change brands.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Zzz
customer_reviews.text: It's really powdery in the container itself, but these babies work. I started taking them since I was having trouble getting sleepy until 3 AM and I have to be up for work at 7:30. Not fun. I pop one of these bad boys and I'm ZONKED 30 minutes later. Half the time, I don't even remember my head hitting the pillow. Best part is that they don't keep my drowsy in the morning like Zquil.
customer_reviews.author: Drew & Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with my body chemistry
customer_reviews.text: I think certain supplements like melatonin and biotin are specific for each person's body composition. This unfortunately doesn't work for me. I think it helps me fall asleep, but I keep waking up throughout the night after I take it. First off, I am kinda terrible about remembering to take this 1 hour before bed, and for me, it takes 1 hour for this to work. I like the fast dissolve tablets, as they work almost instantaneously for me: Natural Webber and Natrol's.
customer_reviews.author: KGRoo

customer_reviews.title: Makes me sleepy
customer_reviews.text: I feel like it really helps me fall asleep. I also don’t feel groggy from it in the morning. I’m still able to wake up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Pacificboya

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been sleeping great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a hard time falling asleep at night for as long as I can remember, but this has worked wonders on my sleep schedule! It works quick and not only do I fall asleep when I want to, but my dreams are vivid which suggests I’m getting much deeper sleep. The first two or three nights, it didn’t put me to sleep entirely or as fast, but after that my body adapted to it I guess and it worked great. Some days after taking it I would feel a little sleepy, but not groggy, and that usually happens anyway for me. This is a great product to help you sleep and is much healthier than other options.
customer_reviews.author: Paul OFarrell

customer_reviews.title: I conk out like a rock
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for getting to sleep at night. I am very sensitive to it and after I take one, I conk out like a rock. I don't really use it myself because it makes it too hard for me to wake up in the morning and I feel an extended grogginess that I dislike, however my boyfriend has been using this frequently to get to sleep since he has been recovering from a broken leg and can't sleep because of the pain. This product is great if you don't have to get up early the next morning, but I personally don't use it because I don't like to be forced to sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Wong

customer_reviews.title: This has help me to sleep
customer_reviews.text: This is not a miracle pill i still have some issues sleeping, but this does help me fall back to sleep if i wake up in the middle of the night. I also feel not groggy side effects in the morning so that is good. I only tae 1 pill though.
customer_reviews.author: joseph m. finley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dosage, pill size, and pill amount
customer_reviews.text: I love melatonin. It has regulated my sleep immensely. The 3mg is perfect and the pill size is bearable for all. You get way more buying the pill form compared to the gummies. Additionally, you aren’t ingesting pointless calories are sugar as with the gummies.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnyo94

customer_reviews.title: MYNA
customer_reviews.text: One star on taste as I have not noticed a taste. Helps me sleep some nights better than others, between 2 to 6 hours sleep. I used to take a larger dose until two years ago when I had a bad accident. For the weeks I was unconscious I was off many medications that I have not needed since. Do not want to go back to a higher dose.
customer_reviews.author: MYNA

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is my first melatonin product and it worked so well. Some nights I have trouble falling asleep so I thought I’d give this a shot. Take a pill an hour or so before bed and you’ll be out in no time. Definitely worth it. I’d just be careful and not take it every night so as not to build a tolerance to the melatonin.
customer_reviews.author: Amil

customer_reviews.title: Nature's no-side-effect sleep aid
customer_reviews.text: One tablet an hour before bedtime has solved all my sleep problems, gently & naturally. You just simply get tired and then want to go to sleep. If you're tired of prescription sleep aids with harsh side effects that don't really work, definitely give melatonin a try. It might be just what you never knew you were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Placebo effect? Who cares it works
customer_reviews.text: Use these for my 7 year old who stays up until midnight or later. Giving him one of these helps him go to sleep a little earlier, around 10:00ish. It may be the placebo effect, but as long as it works, I don’t care! This is natural and works and doesn’t cost a fortune. Time to subscribe and save to these!
customer_reviews.author: Mic Mac

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a problem falling asleep until now. I started using this and it really works. I sleep thru the night and I don't toss and turn. Great price and love Nature Made products.
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Helpful to fall asleep
customer_reviews.text: This is great value for money. However it should be noted that if you ah e problems staying asleep these may not work...try long acting or the ones that release over time. These help me fall asleep not stay asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie  Kanter

customer_reviews.title: A brand that I trust
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended 3 mg Melatonin to help me fall asleep each night. It does help me feel tired. The doctor also recommended no electronics for 1 hour before bed. I take my Melatonin and read a book before bed. I have slept better. Nature Made is a brand that I trust.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Helpful natural sleep aid
customer_reviews.text: I take three of these (9mg total) 1.5 hours before bed as a healthier alternative to prescription drugs or alcohol for getting to sleep. They are also very helpful if you travel between time zones and want to try and boost your ability to sleep in sync with the day / night cycle at your destination.
customer_reviews.author: Dario

customer_reviews.title: Not helpful when you need it
customer_reviews.text: Being honest, this hasn't helped me fall asleep or stay asleep any of the times I've wanted it to. I've still woken up randomly with these on distressed nights and when I was feeling all right, it would knock me out for 12 hours but I'd still wake up tired. Really not sure how that works, but it sucked and I'll make sure to try another provider next time.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Good price and Dependable!
customer_reviews.text: Melatonin helps me fall asleep faster. I've seen a lot of melatonin with a higher price, with other things mixed in or higher mg. I prefer Nature Made because it's dependable, I can still find it without add-ins and at 3 mg. If I feel like I may need more one night, I'll just take 2 or 3. I don't want to have to take 6mg or 10mg because that's all I could find.
customer_reviews.author: M Moore

customer_reviews.title: Swallow, lay down, sleep!
customer_reviews.text: Great low dose tablets. This was the first melatonin supp I’ve bought so I started off with the lower dosage. However, you can always take two for that extra sleepiness power! Definitely help get you to sleep and maintain a sleep schedule. My sleep quality also improved just a tad. The tabs are super small so they are easy to swallow. They do dissolve quickly and have virtually no taste so you can also dissolve in glass of water or in your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sleep 👌🏼
customer_reviews.text: I’m newer to being a melatonin taker but occasionally have difficulties falling asleep. I like the idea of taking something that is a naturally occurring hormone in my body. Usually I’ll take one and within 10 minutes ready for bed. I sleep VERY well with one pill but generally have some weird dreams 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L

customer_reviews.title: Contains phosphate
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I did not read the ingredients on the provided image for the product. One of the ingredients includes phosphate. Someone with chronic kidney disease (CKD) like my husband must avoid phosphates because the kidneys cannot remove phosphorus very well. I had to throw away the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Helped a skeptical teen who began having problems with insomnia...what more can I say!?
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! We’re about a month in to our teen taking these supplements about 30 mij before bedtime. She was skeptical but admits they really do make a difference! I feel comfortable with this brand name and trust the quality control. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Multi-tasking Genius

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep you asleep; you’ll have weird dreams
customer_reviews.text: Definitely puts you to sleep within an hour of taking it but make sure you time it late enough in the night because you’ll wake up after about six hours of sleep. I’ve been taking this for the past month and every time I’ve taken it at 10p and wake up round 4 or 5am every morning. So here I am at 4:45am CST awake and writing this review because my melatonin did it’s job but only for six hours. Also I have to agree with some of the other comments, I’m not sure what it is about melatonin but I also have the strangest and most vivid dreams.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Kween

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Sleep
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this product as directed. One pill, one hour before my intended sleep time. In this sense, it works as described and I drift into a comfortable sleep. Unfortunately, I always awake after just three hours feeling energized and unable to go back to sleep. By 10am I have absolutely no energy. I have used other melatonin products in the past that were far more effective than this.
customer_reviews.author: Don Coyote

customer_reviews.title: Count some sheep.
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal. Works well. I use it with magnesium and sleep like a baby, I break these in half. A whole is too much for me. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Talley

customer_reviews.title: Kind of Worked
customer_reviews.text: I thought that it would work really well but it only starts to kick in for me after like 1.5-2 hours which is a significantly longer than it says on the bottle. I like that it does help a little but it's not the greatest although 5mg is a fair amount. It also depends on the person and how long it'll take to be absorbed into your blood.
customer_reviews.author: s3xyteslaguy

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I went through a period of corona-insomnia and hoped these would do the trick. I slept less on the nights I took these. Maybe I was putting too much faith in them to make me fall asleep, but I was definitely disappointed they didn't knock me out!
customer_reviews.author: Craftsandcritiques

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't help me in no way shape or form. Worst money I have ever spent
customer_reviews.author: Shannelle

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help me in the slightest
customer_reviews.text: I tried this out for about a week as I have been having trouble sleeping for the past few months. Unfortunately, I found that it did absolutely nothing to help me fall asleep. Oh well. I gave one star because the bottle has a nice easy-open tab closure so you don't have to fiddle around with a screw top cap.
customer_reviews.author: RVS

customer_reviews.title: Only problem now is...
customer_reviews.text: I can't sleep without it! But, I am glad it fixed my problem. I'm a pretty big dude, but my first time taking 3mg knocked me out like a light. I've since adjusted but recommend cutting the pills in half to lower the dosage.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: THE WORST PRODUCT I HAVE EVER BOUGHT ON AMAZON!
customer_reviews.text: I used Nature Made Melatonin to sleep. I took as much as 12 mg to no avail. Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Bradberry

customer_reviews.title: Get back in your sleep routine
customer_reviews.text: Get ready for some good sleep with these easy to swallow pills. They are small enough for most ages. After taking these for a few nights I got back into my normal sleep schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle R.

customer_reviews.title: Use a half an hour before sleep
customer_reviews.text: I take one half an hour before I want to go to bed. It doesn't force you go to bed, but it definitely makes it easier to fall asleep. So great, been taking it to change up my sleep cycle because my medical school schedule makes me change my sleep cycle often. I've been using it for over a year and haven't gotten addicted yet. I only take when needed. Such a useful product!
customer_reviews.author: perr

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dog. I needed the 3 mg size that I didn’t find in the store. The pills were a bit powdered from the bottle shaking during shipping. Most of the pills are mostly in tact and work for their purpose. I will probably continue searching local stores or other options since the pills don’t ship well.
customer_reviews.author: Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipment, cheap price, quality made
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works so good that it put me to sleep. Lol. I woke up the next morning with no grogginess. Cheap and works great
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Garbage product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely garbage. This thing is like a stimulant more than a sleep helper. It makes me wake up whenever i take it, completely terrible product. I don’t review stuff but this product is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Dentman96

customer_reviews.title: Product fine. Shipping process damaged pills
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with lot of chalky powder in the bottle. Not enough cotton packing to protect pills during shipping. No packing materials in box to prevent bottles knocking about during shipping. Actual product for those not broken was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: Expired in 2015
customer_reviews.text: The item delivered to me had a 2015 expiration date
customer_reviews.author: Clare Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: I've had better luck with these than actual sleeping pills (and other ...
customer_reviews.text: It is now part of my nighttime ritual to take one of these. I work well up to midnight everyday, and with my amount of daily caffeine consumption, it takes a little help for me to unwind every night. When I take one of these pills, I am out within a half hour. I've had better luck with these than actual sleeping pills (and other melatonin supplements). This, like all Nature Made products that I've used, seems to do its job well. As a bonus, I seem to have and remember more dreams every night now (I must be getting more REM sleep with this supplement).
customer_reviews.author: Charles William

customer_reviews.title: Works good for dogs
customer_reviews.text: If you have a dog with anxiety or is just to hyper at bed time then 1 pill really works well for them. Just dont do it to often or they will become used to it and wont work as good. Consult with your vet on how much to use depending on the size of your dog.
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: Great to help you fall asleep. It doesn’t help keep you asleep.
customer_reviews.text: This is great to help you relax enough to fall asleep. I feel after 3 hours or so it doesn’t do anything to help keep you asleep. It works within 20 minutes or so and 1 tablet was enough for me and I am an adult female 5’7” 160lb
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth MillerTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Love this helps you fall asleep naturally and not feel ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this helps you fall asleep naturally and not feel groggy at all. Just one tip it takes two hours to kick in so take it early. This is way better than chamomile tea you don’t have to worry about getting up in the middle of the night to run to the bathroom...I’m sure you call all relate 😁
customer_reviews.author: Myla

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this melatonin is simply not great. Good melatonin should easy one to sleep, provide uninterrupted sleep, and finally not make you feel groggy the next day. These nature mades don’t do any of that, after taking & waiting for 30-45mins I went to bed & stayed up for the next 2 hours, once I fell asleep I got up every couple of hours, and once I woke up I felt as if I took to many sleeping pills. This is the fourth melatonin supplement I’ve tried & it’s not the worst but not even close to the best.
customer_reviews.author: Issa Wynn san berdo

customer_reviews.title: it does a great job
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised by how these are formed vs others. I had amazon basic melatonin before and I prefer this brand much better. These are pill formed vs amazon basic is gel caps. These will dissolve in your mouth if you leave it under your tongue. It’s much faster acting vs other.
customer_reviews.author: Free Baku

customer_reviews.title: helps me fall asleep fast
customer_reviews.text: I use often to help me fall asleep fast. I have learned that I have to take it right before I am ready to lay down otherwise it does nothing for me. I can have the tv on, but my phone has to be put up, for it stimulates me. It typically takes me about 15 minutes to go to sleep once I take it (as long as I have no stimulus.) It is a low enough dose that I wake up feeling refreshed. It does not help you stay asleep, but once I'm asleep Im usually down for the night.
customer_reviews.author: Jada

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction to this product
customer_reviews.text: I am not allergic in general, but I have reaction to this product. Every time I take it, my face itches especially around my nose, moreover I become restless and can't sleep. I tried different melatonin products in the past, but never had such an unusual reaction.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for ME!
customer_reviews.text: All of our systems are different and our body aches and pains too. Two of these near bedtime does the trick for me. I often take allergy medicine too at bedtime and I wake up without being groggy.
customer_reviews.author: FL Gal

customer_reviews.title: Effective sleep inducer without side effects
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for a year and unlike some other brands I’ve tried this one always make me fall asleep within 20-30 mins max and I usually sleep 8 hours on it. It doesn’t have any side effect and usually a he effect fades soon after I wake up and especially if I’m exposed to sunlight. I find it to be a really good value for the money and I will stick with this brand in future
customer_reviews.author: Dejan Markovkj

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It simply works! Better than anything Ive tried in the past! Within and hour my eyelids are closing. Been using this for 2 yrs and it still works and wake up just fine. Great Company Nature Made!
customer_reviews.author: Dakotalucky

customer_reviews.title: Great Sleep!
customer_reviews.text: First time trying something like this. What a difference it makes! Fall asleep so much easier and sleep through the night!
customer_reviews.author: "Sam"

product_meta.title: Nature Made Melatonin 3mg Tablets, 240 Count for Supporting Restful Sleep† (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description:
Size:240 Count (Pack of 1)Getting proper rest helps you function during the day. Melatonin is a hormone produced in the pineal gland, which helps to regulate sleep and wake cycles. Taking one Nature Made Melatonin 3mg tablet one hour before bedtime may help to support sleep.†

BRAND STORY
By Nature Made
feature_bullets: For a limited time, you may receive either bottle while we update our packaging. Both have the same great product inside. Based on new FDA regulations, you may also notice a change in the unit of measure and/or daily value for certain products.
Contains a 240-day supply of Nature Made Melatonin 3mg Tablets, 240 tablets per bottle.
100% drug free. Natural acting sleep aid.
Adults, take 1 tablet one hour before bedtime with water.
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
